entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The high, cold voice is described as empty of any human kindness and is said to be Lord Voldemort's.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as hearing the high, cold voice and seeing a long-fingered white hand clutching a wand rise on the end of his own arm.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as whispering 'You'll have to kill me'.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as the one who will fetch something for Voldemort.

relationships.description: Voldemort is waiting for Sirius to fetch something for him.
Black will fetch something for Voldemort.
